actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to eliminate the requirement that States pay unemployment compensation on the basis of services performed by election workers.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to eliminate the requirement that States pay unemployment compensation on the basis of services performed by election workers if remuneration for a calendar year is expected to be less than $200.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to eliminate the requirement that States pay unemployment compensation on the basis of services performed by election workers.
